title: This is the title
ctaBox_description: Ready for your next digital project? Our intelligent configurator helps you specify your project and you immediately receive a transparent fixed price.
ctaBox_benefits_zeit_description: Get a binding fixed price within minutes
ctaBox_benefits_massgeschneidert_descrip: Every solution is tailored to your needs
ctaBox_benefits_contact_description: A dedicated contact person accompanies you through the entire project
ctaBox_note: Tip: The configurator takes only 3-5 minutes and you immediately receive your personal project price. No obligation and free of charge.
ctaBox_variant2_description: Have you found the perfect solution for your project? Our intelligent configurator helps you specify your project and you immediately receive a transparent fixed price.
errorPage_notFound: Oops! This page no longer exists.
errorPage_notFoundSubtext: But don't worry, we'll get you where you need to go! Where would you like to go?
login_teaser: If you want to access your own dashboard or use the extended configurator, you must be logged in.
carousel_slide1_text: Discover breathtaking landscapes and create unforgettable memories with our premium outdoor experiences.
carousel_slide2_text: Challenge yourself with thrilling adventures that test your courage and reward your spirit.
carousel_slide3_text: Immerse yourself in pristine wilderness and connect with the raw beauty of the natural world.
carousel_slide4_text: Every moment becomes a story worth telling when you embrace the adventure that calls to you.
carousel_slide5_text: Soar beyond your comfort zone and discover what lies beyond the horizon of possibility.
